data.title: Uschi Gatward

Ellah Allfrey, Flight Press), as a Galley Beggar Press Single, and in the magazines The Barcelona Review, Brittle Star, Gorse, The Lonely Crowd, Shooter, Short FICTION, Southword, Structo and Wasafiri. data.meta_site_name: Arachne Press - Spinning inclusive stories since 2012
data.text:
Uschi Gatward’s stories have appeared in Best British Short Stories 2015 (Salt), Flamingo Land & Other Stories (ed. Ellah Allfrey, Flight Press), as a Galley Beggar Press Single, and in the magazines The Barcelona Review, Brittle Star, Gorse, The Lonely Crowd, Shooter, Short FICTION, Southword, Structo and Wasafiri. She was shortlisted for The White Review Short Story Prize 2016, and her shortlisted story was a For Books’ Sake Weekend Read.

Uschi’s story in We/She is Birth Plan
